statements: SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_territory = 'Europe' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_territory FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_expertise FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Open' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, lead_territory FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_expertise FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_territory DESC;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE lead_territory = 'North' AND lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_status FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads
SELECT lead_name, territory FROM leads WHERE lead_source='Webinar'
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, territory FROM leads ORDER BY territory DESC
SELECT rep_name, expertise FROM sales_representatives WHERE territory='East Coast'
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE territory='West Coast'
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE territory='East';
SELECT lead_name, territory FROM leads WHERE lead_source='Advertisement' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_source='Referral' ORDER BY lead_name, territory ASC;
SELECT rep_name, expertise FROM sales_representatives WHERE territory='Central' ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(lead_id) AS total_leads, territory FROM leads GROUP BY territory HAVING total_leads > 5 ORDER BY total_leads DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, territory FROM leads WHERE territory='East';
SELECT rep_name, sales_territory FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, territory, expertise FROM leads WHERE expertise='Finance';
SELECT assignment_id, assigned_date FROM lead_assignments WHERE assigned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, territory FROM leads WHERE expertise = 'Marketing';
SELECT DISTINCT rep_name, sales_territory FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY sales_territory DESC;
SELECT l.lead_name, r.rep_name, la.assigned_date FROM leads l, sales_representatives r, lead_assignments la WHERE l.lead_id = la.lead_id AND r.rep_id = la.rep_id ORDER BY la.assigned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lead_assignments WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-30';
SELECT lead_name, territory, expertise FROM leads WHERE lead_name LIKE '%John%' AND territory IN ('East Coast', 'West Coast');
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, territory FROM Leads WHERE expertise = 'Marketing';

SELECT assignment_date, lead_name, sales_rep_name FROM Assignments LEFT JOIN Leads ON Assignments.lead_id = Leads.lead_id LEFT JOIN SalesRepresentatives ON Assignments.sales_rep_id = SalesRepresentatives.sales_rep_id;
SELECT territory_name FROM Territories ORDER BY territory_name DESC;

SELECT lead_name, sales_rep_name FROM Leads JOIN Assignments ON Leads.lead_id = Assignments.lead_id JOIN SalesRepresentatives ON Assignments.sales_rep_id = SalesRepresentatives.sales_rep_id WHERE Leads.territory = SalesRepresentatives.territory;
SELECT lead_name, territory FROM Leads WHERE territory = 'North' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assignment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT lead_name, territory, expertise FROM Leads INNER JOIN Assignments ON Leads.lead_id = Assignments.lead_id WHERE Assignments.sales_rep_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT territory FROM Territories;
SELECT lead_name, expertise FROM Leads WHERE territory <> 'South' AND expertise LIKE '%Sales%' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads WHERE lead_territory = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT rep_name, rep_email FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_territory = 'Europe';
SELECT lead_name, rep_name, assignment_date FROM leads l JOIN assignments a ON l.lead_id = a.lead_id JOIN sales_representatives s ON a.rep_id = s.rep_id WHERE a.assignment_status = 'Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_expertise FROM leads WHERE lead_territory = 'USA'
SELECT rep_name, rep_email, rep_territory FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_territory = 'Europe'
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date, assignment_status FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC
SELECT rep_name, rep_email, rep_territory FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_territory = 'Asia' AND rep_expertise = 'Marketing'
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, assignment_status FROM leads l JOIN assignments a ON l.lead_id = a.lead_id WHERE a.assignment_status = 'Pending'
